Jugnoo helps you provide a friendly and affordable ride within the Chandigarh tricity area.\nThe rates are affordable, and definitely a good deal when you get them for a friendly ride.

We regret any difficulty you faced with us. Please let us know about the issue. Get free rides by referring Jugnoo to friends.Every successful referral gets you a free ride. Gift your friend a Jugnoo transaction worth 50 & Get one for yourself as well.

T&C Apply T&C *T&C Applied 1. Jugnoo Cash if present would be the first source of deduction for your ride fare.\n 2. Jugnoo Cash added till January 21, 2016 would expire on March 31, 2016.\n 3. Jugnoo Cash added after January 21, 2016 will expire after one month of crediting.
